title: INControl LF Subs (JG/TOP) High Plat +
body:
Hey guys!

INControl is our Plat III team and we are looking for subs to play in our team. We are an organized team that play often together using comms, we are friendly and easy going. Right now we are 12-0 and play together extremely well, please get back to me or add me in game for trials. Thanks guys

- Rekt Nerd

replies.body: Plat 2 Juangleee, will sub for fun
